trademark: Bang! is a trademark owned by DVGiochi
draw_cards: ‚è¨ Draw you cards from the deck
card_against: Who will you play your card against?
choose_guess: Guess the color of the suit
choose_fratelli_di_sangue: Choose who you want to donate one of your lives
choose_rimbalzo_player: Choose the target of the bang
choose_rimbalzo_card: Choose the card to discard the bang to
choose_nuova_identita: Choose if you want to keep your current character, or if you want to change it and start from 2 HP
emporio_others: {0} is choosing which card to get from the General Store
blackjack_special: If the card is diamonds or hearts, he picks another card.
choose_scarp_card_to: CHOOSE WHICH CARD TO DISCARD TO USE
no_players_in_range: You can't see the other players, equip a weapon or a scope!

chat.spectators: | A spectator is watching the game | {n} spectators are watching the game
chat.choose_character: {0} has {1} as character, his special ability is: {2}!
chat.draw_from_scrap: {0} did draw the first card from the scrap pile.
chat.draw_from_player: {0} did draw the first card from the hand of {1}.
chat.beer_save: {0} used a beer to save his life.
chat.saloon: {0} player {1} and heals 1 HP to everyone alive.
chat.special_bart_cassidy: {0} received a compensation because he was injured.
chat.special_el_gringo: {0} stole a card from {1} when he was was injured.
chat.fratelli_sangue: {0} gave one of his lives to {1}.
chat.lobby_reset: Going back to lobby in {0} seconds...

foc.leggedelwest: He must play this card on this turn if possible.

minimum_players: The game needs at least 3 players to start
disconnect_bot: Replace players that disconnect with bots

Barile.name: Barrel
Barile.desc: When someone plays a Bang against you. You can flip the first card from the deck, if the suit is Hearts then it counts as a Missed card

Dinamite.name: Dynamite
Dinamite.desc: When playing Dynamite, place it in front of you, it will remain harmless for a whole round. At the beginning of the next turn before drawing and before any card flip (eg Prison), flip a card from the top of the deck. If a card is between 2 and 9 of spades (inclusive) then the dynamite explodes: you lose 3 lives and discard the card, otherwise pass the dynamite to the next player, who will draw in turn after you have ended your turn

Mirino.name: Scope
Mirino.desc: You see the other players at distance -1

Mustang.name: Mustang
Mustang.desc: The other players see you at distance +1

Prigione.name: Prison
Prigione.desc: Equip this card to another player, except the Sheriff. The player chosen at the beginning of his turn, must flip a card before drawing: if it's Hearts, discard this card and play the turn normally, otherwise discard this card and skip the turn

Remington.name: Remington
Remington.desc: You can shoot another player at distance 3 or less

Rev Carabine.name: Rev. Carabine
Rev Carabine.desc: You can shoot another player at distance 4 or less

Schofield.name: Schofield
Schofield.desc: You can shoot another player at distance 2 or less

Volcanic.name: Volcanic
Volcanic.desc: You can shoot another player at distance 1 or less, however you no longer have the limit of 1 Bang

Winchester.name: Winchester
Winchester.desc: You can shoot another player at distance 5 or less

Bang!.name: Bang!
Bang!.desc: Shoot a player in sight. If you do not have weapons, your is sight is 1

Birra.name: Beer
Birra.desc: Play this card to regain a life point. You cannot heal more than your character's maximum limit. If you are about to lose your last life point, you can also play this card on your opponent's turn. Beer no longer takes effect if there are only two players

Cat Balou.name: Cat Balou
Cat Balou.desc: Choose and discard a card from any other player.

Duello.name: Duel
Duello.desc: Play this card against any player. In turn, starting with your opponent, you can discard a Bang! Card, the first player who does not do so loses 1 life.

Emporio.name: General Store
Emporio.desc: Put on the table N cards from the deck, where N is the number of alive players, in turn, starting with you, choose a card and add it to your hand

Indiani!.name: Indians!
Indiani!.desc: All the other players must discard a Bang! or lose 1 Health Point

Mancato!.name: Missed!
Mancato!.desc: Use this card to cancel the effect of a bang

Panico!.name: Panic!
Panico!.desc: Steal a card from a player at distance 1

Binocolo.name: Binocular
Binocolo.desc: You see the other players at distance -1

Riparo.name: Hideout
Riparo.desc: The other players see you at distance +1

Rag Time.name: Rag Time
Rag Time.desc: Steal a card from another player at any distance

Rissa.name: Brawl
Rissa.desc: Choose a card to discard from the hand/equipment of all the other players

Schivata.name: Dodge
Schivata.desc: Use this card to cancel the effect of a bang and then draw a card.

Springfield.name: Springfield
Springfield.desc: Shoot a player at any distance

Tequila.name: Tequila
Tequila.desc: Heal 1 HP to a player of your choice (can be you)

Bibbia.name: Bible
Bibbia.desc: Use this card to cancel the effect of a bang and then draw a card.

Cappello.name: Ten Gallon Hat
Cappello.desc: Use this card to cancel the effect of a bang

Placca Di Ferro.name: Iron Plate
Placca Di Ferro.desc: Use this card to cancel the effect of a bang

Sombrero.name: Sombrero
Sombrero.desc: Use this card to cancel the effect of a bang

Derringer.name: Derringer
Derringer.desc: Shoot a player at distance 1 and then draw a card.

Can Can.name: Can Can
Can Can.desc: Choose and discard a card from any other player.

Conestoga.name: Conestoga
Conestoga.desc: Steal a card from another player at any distance

Fucile Da Caccia.name: Buffalo Rifle
Fucile Da Caccia.desc: Shoot a player at any distance

Pepperbox.name: Pepperbox
Pepperbox.desc: Shoot a player in sight. If you do not have weapons, your is sight is 1

Bart Cassidy.name: Bart Cassidy
Bart Cassidy.desc: Each time he is hurt, he draws a card.

Black Jack.name: Black Jack
Black Jack.desc: At the beginning of his turn, when he has to draw, he shows everyone the second card, if it is Hearts or Diamonds he draws a third card without showing it.

Calamity Janet.name: Calamity Janet
Calamity Janet.desc: She can use the Missed! as Bang! and the other way around.

El Gringo.name: El Gringo
El Gringo.desc: Each time he is hurt, he draws a card from the hand of the attacking player.

Jesse Jones.name: Jesse Jones
Jesse Jones.desc: When he has to draw his cards, he may draw the first card from the hand of another player. (click on the enemy player's card's if you want to use the ability)

Jourdonnais.name: Jourdonnais
Jourdonnais.desc: He plays as he had a Barrel always active, if he equips another Barrel, he can flip 2 cards.

Kit Carlson.name: Kit Carlson
Kit Carlson.desc: When he has to draw, he peeks 3 cards and chooses 2, putting the other card on the top of the deck.

Lucky Duke.name: Lucky Duke
Lucky Duke.desc: Every time he has to flip a card, he can flip 2 times.

Paul Regret.name: Paul Regret
Paul Regret.desc: The other players see him at distance +1.

Pedro Ramirez.name: Pedro Ramirez
Pedro Ramirez.desc: When he has to draw, he may pick the first card from the discarded cards. (click on the discarded cards to use the ability)

Rose Doolan.name: Rose Doolan
Rose Doolan.desc: She sees the other players at distance -1.

Sid Ketchum.name: Sid Ketchum
Sid Ketchum.desc: He can discard 2 cards to regain 1HP.

Slab The Killer.name: Slab The Killer
Slab The Killer.desc: To dodge his Bang! cards other players need 2 Missed!

Suzy Lafayette.name: Suzy Lafayette
Suzy Lafayette.desc: Whenever she has an empty hand, she draws a card.

Vulture Sam.name: Vulture Sam
Vulture Sam.desc: When a player dies, he gets all the cards in the dead's hand and equipments.

Willy The Kid.name: Willy The Kid
Willy The Kid.desc: He doesn't have limits to the amounts of bang he can use.

Tequila Joe.name: Tequila Joe
Tequila Joe.desc: When he plays Beer, he regains 2 Health Points.

Greg Digger.name: Greg Digger
Greg Digger.desc: Whenever a player dies, he regains up to 2 lives.

Herb Hunter.name: Herb Hunter
Herb Hunter.desc: Whenever a player dies, he draws 2 cards.

Elena Fuente.name: Elena Fuente
Elena Fuente.desc: She can use any card of her hand as missed.

Bill Noface.name: Bill Noface
Bill Noface.desc: Draw 1 card + 1 card for each wound he has.

Molly Stark.name: Molly Stark
Molly Stark.desc: When she uses a card from her hand outside her turn, she draws a card.

Apache Kid.name: Apache Kid
Apache Kid.desc: Cards of diamonds ‚ô¶Ô∏è played against him, do no have effect (doesn't work in duels).

Sean Mallory.name: Sean Mallory
Sean Mallory.desc: He can keep up to 10 cards in his hand when ending the turn.

Belle Star.name: Belle Star
Belle Star.desc: During her turn the green and blue cards of the other players do not work.

Vera Custer.name: Vera Custer
Vera Custer.desc: Before drawing, she may choose the special ability on another alive player. This ability is used until next turn.

Chuck Wengam.name: Chuck Wengam
Chuck Wengam.desc: On his turn he may decide to lose 1 HP to draw 2 cards from the deck.

Pat Brennan.name: Pat Brennan
Pat Brennan.desc: Instead of drawing he can steal a card from the equipment of another player. (click on the enemy player if you want to use the ability)

Jos√© Delgado.name: Jos√© Delgrado
Jos√© Delgado.desc: On his turn he can discard a blue card to draw 2 cards, up to twice per turn.

Doc Holyday.name: Doc Holyday
Doc Holyday.desc: He can discard 2 cards to play a bang.

Miniera Abbandonata.name: Abandoned Mine
Miniera Abbandonata.desc: Players draw from the discarded pile in their phase 1 and discard to the top of the deck during phase 3 (if the discaded pile runs out, they must draw and discard on top of the deck)

Il Giudice.name: The Judge
Il Giudice.desc: You can't equip cards on your or other players

Agguato.name: Ambush
Agguato.desc: The base distance from any 2 players is 1

Rimbalzo.name: Ricochet
Rimbalzo.desc: The player can play bang against the cards equipped by the other players, if they do not play miss they are discarded (click the event card)

Cecchino.name: Sniper
Cecchino.desc: During their turn, players can discard 2 Bang! to shoot a bang that requires 2 missed (click the card)

Lazo.name: Lasso
Lazo.desc: Cards in the equipment slot do not work

Ranch.name: Ranch
Ranch.desc: After drawing, the player can discard as many cards as he wants from his hand and draw as many from the deck

Dead Man.name: Dead Man
Dead Man.desc: The first player that died returns back to life with 2 hp and 2 cards

Liquore Forte.name: Hard Liquor
Liquore Forte.desc: Players can skip drawing to regain 1 HP (click on the event card to use)

Vendetta.name: Vendetta
Vendetta.desc: When ending the turn, the player flips a card from the deck, if it's ♥️ he plays another turn (but he does not flip another card)

Roulette Russa.name: Russian Roulette
Roulette Russa.desc: Starting from the sheriff, every player discards 1 missed, the first one that doesn't loses 2 HP

Legge Del West.name: Law Of The West
Legge Del West.desc: Every player shows the second card that they draw and must use it in that round (if it is possible)

Peyote.name: Peyote
Peyote.desc: Instead of drawing, the player tries to guess the color of the suit, if he's right he adds the card to the hand and continues trying to guess the next card

Fratelli Di Sangue.name: Blood Brothers
Fratelli Di Sangue.desc: At the begin of their turn, payers can lose 1 hp (except the last one) to give it to another player

I Dalton.name: The Daltons
I Dalton.desc: Players that have blue cards equipped, discard 1 of those card of their choice

Sermone.name: The Sermon
Sermone.desc: Players can't play Bang! during their turn

Citt\u00e0 Fantasma.name: Ghost Town
Citt\u00e0 Fantasma.desc: All dead players come back to life in their turn, they can't die and draw 3 cards instead of 2. When they end their turn the die.

Sbornia.name: Hangover
Sbornia.desc: The characters lose their special abilities

Il Dottore.name: The Doctor
Il Dottore.desc: The player with the least amount of HP gets healed 1

Sete.name: Thirst
Sete.desc: Players only draw 1 card at the start of their turn

Mezzogiorno di Fuoco.name: High Noon
Mezzogiorno di Fuoco.desc: Every player loses 1 HP when their turn starts

Per Un Pugno Di Carte.name: A Fistful of Cards
Per Un Pugno Di Carte.desc: On the beginning of his turn, the player is target of as many Bang as how many cards he has in his hand

help.characters_special:
Each character has special abilities and a number of lives that make them unique. 
Lives are the number of life points you can lose before dying and also indicate the maximum number of cards you can hold in your hand.
help.deathnobeer:
When you lose your last life point and you don't have a beer üç∫Ô∏è in your hand, you die. 
Your cards are discarded and your role revealed to everyone.
help.distancecalc: The distance is automatically calculated by the game and corresponds to the minimum distance between the player's left and right.
help.drawinstructions: To draw cards you will need to click on the deck when you see this animation.
help.endgameconditions: The game ends when one of the following conditions is met:
help.endgamesheriffwin:
All the outlaws üê∫Ô∏è and renegades ü¶ÖÔ∏è are dead. 
In this case the sheriff ‚≠êÔ∏è and the deputies üéñÔ∏è win.
help.endgameshriffdeath:
Sheriff ‚≠êÔ∏è dies. 
If the renegade ü¶ÖÔ∏è is the last player alive he wins, otherwise the outlaws win.
help.endingturn:
When you have finished playing your cards, that is, when you do not want or cannot play any more cards, you must discard the cards that exceed your current number of lives.

Then you pass the turn to the next player by clicking on end turn.
help.justoneweapon: You can only have 1 weapon equipped.
help.maxtwocardsequip: You cannot have 2 cards with the same name equipped.
help.outlawreward: Anyone who kills an outlaw üê∫Ô∏è draws 3 cards from the deck (other outlaws too üê∫Ô∏è).
help.playingdmg: You can play your cards for yourself or to harm other players by trying to eliminate them.
help.playingduringturn:
You can only play the cards on your turn. To play cards, click on the cards from you hand.
With the exception of cards used as an answer such as Missed üòÖÔ∏è.
help.playingifyouwant: You are not required to play cards.
help.playonlyonebang:
You can only play 1 Bang! 
per turn (refers only to cards named Bang!)
help.sheriffkillsvice: If the sheriff ‚≠êÔ∏è kills a deputy, he loses all the cards in his hand and in play in front of him.
help.title: How to play
help.turnstart: It always starts with the Sheriff ‚≠êÔ∏è, and the game continues clockwise, the turns are divided into 3 phases.
